paper_abstract: Sequences with optimal autocorrelation property are needed in certain communication systems and cryptography. In this paper, a construction of balanced quaternary sequences with period N equivalent to 2(mod 4) and optimal autocorrelation value and a construction of almost balanced binary sequences with period N equivalent to 0(mod 4) and optimal autocorrelation value are presented. Both constructions are a generalization of earlier ones.
paper_title: New Classes of Balanced Quaternary and Almost Balanced Binary Sequences With Optimal Autocorrelation Value
